event.description: {CovLStrv2{Setting raw HTML content without proper sanitization to the `innerHTML` property of a DOM element by using the `dangerouslySetInnerHTML` attribute may lead to cross-site scripting vulnerabilities.}}
{CovLStrv2{Audit the usage of `dangerouslySetInnerHTML` to make sure it is necessary and its content is properly sanitized.}}

typePropertiesGroup.type: Unsafe output of data into innerHtml
typePropertiesGroup.longDescription: Setting raw HTML content without proper sanitization to the `innerHTML` property of a DOM element by using the `dangerouslySetInnerHTML` attribute may lead to cross-site scripting vulnerabilities.
